sn6.11:1.2: ekam samayam bhagava rajagahe viharati sappinitire.
sn6.11:1.3: Atha kho brahma sanankumaro abhikkantaya rattiya abhikkantavanno kevalakappam sappinitiram obhasetva yena bhagava tenupasankami; upasankamitva bhagavantam abhivadetva ekamantam atthasi.
sn6.11:1.4: Ekamantam thito kho brahma sanankumaro bhagavato santike imam gatham abhasi:
sn6.11:3.3: Atha kho brahma sanankumaro “samanunno me sattha”ti bhagavantam abhivadetva padakkhinam katva tatthevantaradhayiti.
